attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP! I tried downloading the app and a huge virus and a hacker from RUSSIA hacked my phone and then my computer and then my WiFi and then my cable and then everything else connected via internet. THEY TOOK EVERYTHING. TRUMP IS IN BED WITH RUSSIA! HE IS PLANNING THIS! H wants people to download this so that he can ONCE AGAIN put the American people AT RISK.

attributes.title: Bad, really really really bad
attributes.review: When I downloaded it, it took three hours, then I couldn’t even open it. Also the app said something about “simulation” idk tho because I’m a stupid idiot white trash that thinks trump is an actual good president, let alone human being.

attributes.title: MADE ME SICK TO MY STOMACH💔🤮
attributes.review: Most horrible thing I’ve ever downloaded.. I do not recommend! Ever since I downloaded this app, my phone has been lagging. It takes a lot of data and the worse part is... the app is made for trump..🤕 if I could rate this a 0 I most definitely would!!

attributes.title: Very much a no!
attributes.review: The app took 3 days to download and when it did my whole phone was glitching and my apple iCloud was being hacked and so as well my gmail and other thing soo since then I would not recommend u download this app at all🙂

attributes.title: Worst app in history 🙄
attributes.review: Worst app i ever used never used an app that is so white and doesn’t care about the people doesn’t care about anyone but itself has a rapist and racist person controlling the app this app shouldn’t exist at all it has offended so many people

attributes.title: Terrible App
attributes.review: It took a whole day to download and once I opened the app my screen froze for another 2 hours!!!! I had to go to the apple store DURING A PANDEMIC to try and get my phone fixed! Also my trump face mask ripped while I was at the apple store so I rate the face mask 1 star as well!

attributes.title: Literally the worst all
attributes.review: This app needed all of my personal information. Why ban tik tok for stealing our information when our own president is doing it already using this app. I will be deleting this app rn. Unsubscribe from you Trump. And stop stealing the people's information!!!😡😡😡

attributes.title: Terrible experience
attributes.review: The app took so long to download that I forgot I had even bothered. When I saw it was ready I opened the app and it called me a snowflake❄️ So now I shall quote “if I’m a snowflake be ready for winter b*tch” 🤪 anyways save yourself some time. I wouldn’t recommend downloading this app.

attributes.title: Death threats! 😧
attributes.review: First of all I wish I could give this zero stars. The first thing that happened was that they tried to steal all my info and said if I don’t they will come to my house and kill me and my family. They also tried forcing their opinions on me. DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.title: PLEASE FIX T-T
attributes.review: This app called me several racial slurs and held me at gunpoint. I am traumatized and my family can no longer look me in the eyes.... I demand money for my troubles. Please, fix this new update and I will, out of the kindness of my heart, keep the 1 star rating because it is what you deserve. 😊✨ Thanks.
